column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a tapas restaurant through and through
column2: but the star of the show for me is the paella.  I've ordered a couple different paellas
column3: and they have all been tremendous.  You have to order it.  Some other recommendatons: waffle-battered chicken stick (brunch)
column5: and the chroizo wrapped date from the pintxos menu.
